title: Noam Chomsky: How Palestine Could Be Liberated
description:
Noam Chomsky explains how the policy of the Israeli state has become the construction of a 'Greater Israel' through the mass illegal annexation of Palestinian land, leading to the permanent subjugation of the Palestinian people. But there is hope: Israel is completely dependent on the US for its existence, and attitudes towards Israel are changing, with support becoming increasingly confined to the hard right.

Watch the full interview here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1W1gCzbQr2k

Support us challenging the right-wing media here: https://patreon.com/owenjones84
